name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John Delbert BEASELY, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John Delbert BEASELY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James R. Wilson, Pittsburgh, for John Delbert Beasley.
Michael W. Streily, Deputy Dist. Atty., Robert A. Willig, Asst. Dist. Atty., for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John Delbert BEASELY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 14, 1999.
Decided Oct. 4, 1999.
James R. Wilson, Pittsburgh, for John Delbert Beasley.

Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
